channel.title: Auto save problem
channel.description:
Hey, I have a problem with auto-save.
Accounts do not save as soon as somebody logs in and they only seem to save every few minutes or something so it causes loss of money levels etc, = frustration to people on my server and me when trying to make mod or admin accounts.
Help appreciated
Thanks

item.title: Auto save problem
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Helps if we can see what you’re using for autosave, and if you don’t currently have something, attempt to make one, then post and ask for help if it doesn’t work.

Read full topic
